member.summary: ID of the community that owns the discussion board.

member.summary: IDs of topics to be returned (100 maximum). By default, all topics are returned. If this parameter is set, the order, offset, and count parameters are ignored.

member.name: P:ModernDev.InTouch.BoardGetTopicsParams.Order
member.summary:
Sort order: 1 — by date updated in reverse chronological order. 2 — by date created in reverse chronological order. -1 — by date updated in chronological order. -2 — by date created in chronological order.
If no sort order is specified, topics are returned in the order specified by the group administrator.Pinned topics are returned first, regardless of the sorting.

member.summary: Offset needed to return a specific subset of topics.

member.summary: Number of topics to return.

member.name: P:ModernDev.InTouch.BoardGetTopicsParams.Extended
member.summary: True — to return information about users who created topics or who posted there last. False — to return no additional fields(default).

member.name: P:ModernDev.InTouch.BoardGetTopicsParams.Preview
member.summary: 1 — to return the first comment in each topic. 2 — to return the last comment in each topic. 0 — to return no comments(default).

member.name: P:ModernDev.InTouch.BoardGetTopicsParams.PreviewLength
member.summary: Number of characters after which to truncate the previewed comment. To preview the full comment, specify 0.

member.summary: Filters to apply.

member.summary: True - to return news items from banned sources.

member.name: P:ModernDev.InTouch.NewsfeedGetParams.SourceIds
member.summary:
Sources to obtain news from, separated by commas.
User IDs can be specified in formats $uid or u$uid where $uid is the user's friend ID.
Community IDs can be specified in formats -$gid or g$gid where $gid is the community ID.
If the parameter is not set, all of the user's friends and communities are returned, except for banned sources, which can be obtained with the method.

Approves or creates a friend request.

Text of the message (up to 500 characters) for the friend request, if any.

member.name: T:ModernDev.InTouch.StorageMethods
member.summary: Provides a base class for managing app variables.

member.name: M:ModernDev.InTouch.StorageMethods.#ctor(ModernDev.InTouch.InTouch)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a given instance.
member.param: An instance of class.

member.name: M:ModernDev.InTouch.StorageMethods.Get(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary:
Returns a value of variable with the name set by key parameter.
Use method to set the value.
Variables can be stored in two scopes:
Custom Variable is bound to the user and other users cannot read it.
Global Variable is bound to the application and its usage does not depend on the user. If this method is called by others but not by the application, global parameter should be passed to access the variable.
member.param: The name of the variable.
Set to True if you want to work with global variables, not the user variables.
User id, whose variables names are returned if they were requested with a server method.
member.returns: Returns a value of the variable. If there is no variable on server, an empty string will be returned.

member.name: M:ModernDev.InTouch.StorageMethods.Get(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary:
Returns a value of variable with the name set by key parameter.
Use method to set the value.
Variables can be stored in two scopes:
Custom Variable is bound to the user and other users cannot read it.
Global Variable is bound to the application and its usage does not depend on the user. If this method is called by others but not by the application, global parameter should be passed to access the variable.
member.param: A list of variable names, separated by commas.
Set to True if you want to work with global variables, not the user variables.
User id, whose variables names are returned if they were requested with a server method.

member.name: M:ModernDev.InTouch.StorageMethods.Set(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary:
Saves a value of variable with the name set by key parameter.
Use method to receive the saved value.
Variables can be stored in two scopes:
Custom. Variable is bound to the user and only he/she or the application server can get access to it. Maximum 1000 variables can be created for each user.
Global Variable is bound to the application and its usage does not depend on the user. To set a global variable when using API by the user, global parameter shall be passed. Maximum 5000 global variables can be created.
To delete the variable you shall pass a blank value in value parameter.
member.param: The name of the variable.
The value of the variable. Only the first 4096 bytes will be stored.
Set to True if you want to work with global variables, not the user variables.
User id, whose variables names are returned if they were requested with a server method.
member.returns: Returns True if the variable is saved successfully.

member.name: M:ModernDev.InTouch.StorageMethods.GetKeys(System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the names of all variables.
member.param: Set to True if you want to work with global variables, not the user variables.
User id, whose variables names are returned if they were requested with a server method.
Offset required to choose a particular variable names subset. 0 by default.
Amount of variable names the info needs to be collected from.

member.name: T:ModernDev.InTouch.PhotoSizeTypes
member.summary: Notation types for photo copy size and ratio.

member.name: F:ModernDev.InTouch.PhotoSizeTypes.S
member.summary: Proportional copy with 75px max width.

member.name: F:ModernDev.InTouch.PhotoSizeTypes.M
member.summary: Proportional copy with 130px max width.

member.name: F:ModernDev.InTouch.PhotoSizeTypes.X
member.summary: Proportional copy with 604px max width.

member.name: F:ModernDev.InTouch.PhotoSizeTypes.O
member.summary: If original image's "width/height" ratio is less or equal to 3:2, then proportional copy with 130px max width. If original image's "width/height" ratio is more than 3:2, then copy of cropped by left side image with 130px max width and 3:2 sides ratio.

member.name: F:ModernDev.InTouch.PhotoSizeTypes.P
member.summary: If original image's "width/height" ratio is less or equal to 3:2, then proportional copy with 200px max width. If original image's "width/height" ratio is more than 3:2, then copy of cropped by left side image with 200px max width and 3:2 sides ratio.

member.name: F:ModernDev.InTouch.PhotoSizeTypes.Q
member.summary: If original image's "width/height" ratio is less or equal to 3:2, then proportional copy with 320px max width. If original image's "width/height" ratio is more than 3:2, then copy of cropped by left side image with 320px max width and 3:2 sides ratio.

member.name: F:ModernDev.InTouch.PhotoSizeTypes.R
member.summary: If original image's "width/height" ratio is less or equal to 3:2, then proportional copy with 510px max width. If original image's "width/height" ratio is more than 3:2, then copy of cropped by left side image with 510px max width and 3:2 sides ratio.

member.name: F:ModernDev.InTouch.PhotoSizeTypes.Y
member.summary: Proportional copy with 807px max width.

member.name: F:ModernDev.InTouch.PhotoSizeTypes.Z
member.summary: Proportional copy with 1280x1024px max size.

member.name: F:ModernDev.InTouch.PhotoSizeTypes.W
member.summary: Proportional copy with 2560x2048px max size.

member.summary: First name.

member.summary: Last name.

member.summary: Returns if a profile is deleted or blocked. Gets the value or . Keep in mind that in this case no additional fields are returned.

member.summary: Returns while operating without access_token if a user has set the "Who can see my profile on the Internet" → "Only VK users" privacy setting. Keep in mind that in this case no additional fields are returned.

member.name: P:ModernDev.InTouch.User.Verified
member.summary: Returns true if the profile is verified, false if not.

member.summary: Returns true if a current user is in the requested user's blacklist.

member.name: P:ModernDev.InTouch.User.Sex
member.summary: User sex.

member.name: P:ModernDev.InTouch.User.BDate
member.summary: User's date of birth. Returned as DD.MM.YYYY or DD.MM (if birth year is hidden). If the whole date is hidden, no field is returned.

member.name: P:ModernDev.InTouch.User.City
member.summary: User's city.

member.name: P:ModernDev.InTouch.User.Country
member.summary: User's country.

member.name: P:ModernDev.InTouch.User.HomeTown
member.summary: User's home town.

member.name: P:ModernDev.InTouch.User.Photo50
member.summary: Returns URL of square photo of the user with 50 pixels in width. In case user does not have a photo, http://vk.com/images/camera_c.gif is returned.

member.name: P:ModernDev.InTouch.User.Photo100
member.summary: Returns URL of square photo of the user with 100 pixels in width. In case user does not have a photo, http://vk.com/images/camera_b.gif is returned.

member.name: P:ModernDev.InTouch.User.Photo200Orig
member.summary: Returns URL of user's photo with 200 pixels in width. In case user does not have a photo, http://vk.com/images/camera_a.gif is returned.

member.name: P:ModernDev.InTouch.User.Photo200
member.summary: Returns URL of square photo of the user with 200 pixels in width. If the photo was uploaded long time ago, there can be no image of such size and in this case the reply will not include this field.

member.name: P:ModernDev.InTouch.User.Photo400Orig
member.summary: Returns URL of user's photo with 400 pixels in width. If user does not have a photo of such size, reply will not include this field.

member.name: P:ModernDev.InTouch.User.PhotoMax
member.summary: Returns URL of square photo of the user with maximum width. Can be returned a photo both 200 and 100 pixels in width. In case user does not have a photo, http://vk.com/images/camera_b.gif is returned.

member.name: P:ModernDev.InTouch.User.PhotoMaxOrig
member.summary: Returns URL of user's photo of maximum size. Can be returned a photo both 400 and 200 pixels in width. In case user does not have a photo, http://vk.com/images/camera_a.gif is returned.

member.name: P:ModernDev.InTouch.User.Online
member.summary: Information whether the user is online. Returned values: true — online, false — offline. If user utilizes a mobile application or site mobile version, it returns additional field that includes true. With that, in case of application, additional field is returned with application ID.

member.name: P:ModernDev.InTouch.User.Lists
member.summary: Information about friend lists. Returns IDs of friend lists the user is member of.

member.name: P:ModernDev.InTouch.User.Domain
member.summary: Page screen name. Returns a string with a page screen name (only subdomain is returned, like virtyaluk). If not set, "id'+uid is returned, e.g. id16815310.

member.name: P:ModernDev.InTouch.User.HasMobile
member.summary: Information whether the user's mobile phone number is available. Returned values: true — available, otherwise false. We recommend you to use it prior to call of method.

member.name: P:ModernDev.InTouch.User.MobilePhone
member.summary: User's mobile phone number (only for standalone applications);

member.name: P:ModernDev.InTouch.User.HomePhone
member.summary: User's additional phone number.

member.name: P:ModernDev.InTouch.VideoCatalogBlock.Id
member.summary:
Block Id. Returns a string for the predefined blocks and the number for all the others.
Predefined blocks:
my User's videos.
feed Post of communities and friends, containing videos and new videos added by them.
ugc Popular videos.
series Tv-series.
top Editor's choice.
